entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

alerts.subject: Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Madrid, Paris, Stockholm, Warsaw Scheduled Maintenance - 2025-08-13

entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Madrid, Paris, Stockholm, Warsaw locations during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-08-13 00:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-08-13 03:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Madrid, Paris, Stockholm, Warsaw instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
